name: GPT-4o Audio Preview
description: GPT-4o Audio Preview is a specialized variant optimized for asynchronous audio input and output, with support for detecting audio nuances and sentiment in recordings.
notes: Focused on text and audio modalities. Does not support image/vision capabilities. Audio token pricing reduced by 60% in December 2024 version (gpt-4o-audio-preview-2024-12-17). Cached audio input costs $2.50/1M tokens (87.5% reduction).
